name: Color from Summer · 夏日绘彩
name_original: Color from Summer · 夏日绘彩
description:
Relax in VR Shell Spray-painting
在 VR 喷绘贝壳的过程中放松身心吧！

Welcome to the "Summer of Color" VR virtual resort, come spray paint seashells with us today! You will be surrounded by beautiful archipelago scenery and will be able to pick up colors from everything around you to use in your own shell creations. At the end of your trip, you'll also get an exclusive e-postcard to Share Your Joy with Your Friends™!

欢迎来到“夏日绘彩”VR 虚拟度假区，今天来和我们一同喷绘贝壳吧！您将被美丽的群岛风景所包围，并能够从周围的一切东西上吸取颜色，用于您自己的贝壳创作。在旅行结束的时候，您还可以获得独家的电子明信片，可以和朋友们分享您的喜悦™噢！

Features
游戏亮点
  • A relaxing VR shell spray painting tour
  • Turn the world into your color palette
  • Feel free to create your own shells, but we'll provide tips if you need them!
  • Simple but great looking art style
  • Get postcards that you can share with your friends
  • 放松惬意的 VR 贝壳喷绘之旅
  • 把整个世界变成你的色板
  • 随性创作你的贝壳，但需要的话，我们也会提供小贴士！
  • 简单但好看的美术风格
  • 获得能够和朋友分享的明信片
